name: PublishToSharePoint
description: Publish files to remote SharePoint document library.
author: ggarbuglia

inputs.name: sourcepath
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The local folder where you have your file(s).

inputs.name: excludetypeslist
inputs.label: Exclude Types List
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A comma separated list of wildcard file types to exclude.
Example: *.bak,*.log,*.txt.

inputs.name: server
inputs.label: SharePoint Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The FQDN of the SharePoint server you want to reach.

inputs.name: adminusr
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the remote machine. Account must have ShellAdmin permissions (see overview).

inputs.name: adminpwd
inputs.label: Admin Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Password for administrator login for the remote machine.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: spsiteurl
inputs.label: Site Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SharePoint Site Collection Url you want to reach (like 'http://sharepoint').

inputs.name: spweburl
inputs.label: Web Relative Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SharePoint Web relative path you want to reach (like '/web1/web2').

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: User Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user account [domain\username] to impersonate file upload.

inputs.name: doclibfolder
inputs.label: Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder or folder path inside your Document Library (like 'level1/level2').

inputs.name: createfolders
inputs.label: Auto Create Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: If your folder definition does not exists I will create it for you.
